title: Chicken and mushroom puff slice
ingredients: ['1 packet puff pastry, defrosted', '1 tablespoon olive oil for frying', '1 chicken breast, thinly sliced into chunks', '1 handful chestnut mushrooms, diced', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '120ml milk', '1 handful grated cheese', '1 egg, beaten']
